reviews.review_msg: Helpful somedays, but not the next.  Sometimes gets frusterated with students who should know more, but only usually if you haven't studied at all.  Sometimes seems like she's giving you icy glares, but most likely isn't.

Very patient when it was really obvious that her students' Spanish skills were frustratingly horrible compared to what she's used to. Always cheery, always helpful, and disturbingly easy on the eyes for someone older than my mother.
Very patient. She will bear the wrath of frustrated 103 students over the many verb tenses required, without a single sign of frustration. Very charming lady.
